pull_requests.title: BIP119: Fix plotting of pending transactions for congestion control rates
pull_requests.body: Correct the assignment of variables when plotting "Confirmed but Pending Transactions" in the simulation. Now, the 1x rate line uses blocktimes_c1 and unspendable, and the 2x rate line uses blocktimes_c2 and unspendable2, ensuring the graph labels and data match correctly. This improves the accuracy and clarity of the simulation results visualization.

comment_list.body: Thank you for your proposal, but per code review and the resulting images this change appears to only be swapping two colors in the plot and not fixing anything. Closing for now, unless new information corrects this.
